website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful Chinese chao gong that's handcrafted using traditional methods.
pros: Stands out for its versatility — can be used as a meditation aid, in an orchestra, or simply as a decorative piece
cons: A handful of buyers didn't receive the mallet that's supposed to be included

customer_reviews.title: Great Gong!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This gong is small and compact. It's great for making a grand entrance into bars, restaurants, and nursing homes. This is also good for waking up that guest that has overstayed there welcome and corrective behavioral tool for small kids and animal training.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Reed

customer_reviews.title: The right gong
customer_reviews.text: This gong is perfect for creating the effects of world folk music at home
customer_reviews.author: Michael Janusek

customer_reviews.title: Delightful!  Met & Exceeded expectations -
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift as an upgrade - I'd given a friend a triangle to ring upon completion of a task and she had tasks that deserved a richer sound - - SO I got her the GONG! I'd LOOKed at it but didn't want to submit a review until SHE told me how SHE liked it. WELL, she LOVES it!! It's rich sounding and handsome to look at - A great purchase all around. _I_ was actually CALLed by Andreas! Now, THAT's customer service - - :>) Andreas! Thanks - - Jana
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: no beater... ☹
customer_reviews.text: Gong is great, but came without beater... I got a partial refund...
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: only received a partial order the beater was missing
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the full order the beater was missing.
customer_reviews.author: mike skyles

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: For such a small gong, this has wonderful sound and amplification. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a small gong.
customer_reviews.author: catlove

customer_reviews.title: The Gong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who lives on his own and he loved it. The sound is great even though it is not huge, but won't be dissappointed by the sound.
customer_reviews.author: sbw

customer_reviews.title: Loved the gong
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sound. I took the gong to a Lady Gaga concert at Roseland Ballroom. I met her at the end of the night and she took the gong with her. There are pictures of Lady Gaga, me and the gong on the internet. It was a good luck gong. Sincerley, Denise Hunter
customer_reviews.author: Denise Hunter

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with the beater, so now it's pretty useless...
customer_reviews.author: Harrison

customer_reviews.title: " nice! "
customer_reviews.text: the gong has a real good sound. and the stricker with it is a nice touch. the gong has become part of my everyday thing now.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this online, I liked the look so ordered it with a use in mind. I came as advertised and is a nice quality piece. It took several tries to get it to hang properly. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Bos

product_meta.title: DOBANI Chao Gong w/ Beater 7" (18cm)
product_meta.description:
These exquisite authentic Chinese gongs produce a classic rich booming sound when struck with its special mallet or beater (included). They were originally used as a call to worship, as a form of communication between villages and temples, and as a way to clear bad chi (energy) from an area. Nowadays, gongs have taken on a more artistic and symbolic role. It can be featured on a stand or hung from a cord. It also makes a beautiful decor piece.

Brand new!
feature_bullets: Brass Gong hand made in China.
